snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo scored three goals in his second straight game as Real Madrid defeated Ajax, 4-1, in Amsterdam in the Champions League on Wednesday.
abstract: Real Madrid defeats Ajax, 4-1, in Champions League soccer action; Madrid forward Cristiano Ronaldo scores three goals in his second straight game; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo scored three goals in his second straight game as Real Madrid defeated Ajax, 4-1, in Amsterdam in the Champions League on Wednesday.
